INFO.BODY: Most refuges don't actually have a reservation system. Guests are expected to use them whenever they want. However, RefuApp aims to provide a mechanism through which guests can notify other RefuApp users about their intent to visit a given refuge on a specific date, making it easier to determine if a refuge will likely be full or not.

DELETE_ALERT.SUBHEADER: Do you want to delete your reservation?
DELETE_ALERT.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete your reservation for the day {{day}}?

CREATE_OPERATION.INVALID_DATE_ALREADY_RESERVED: Can't select a date that is already reserved!
CREATE_OPERATION.NOT_ALLOWED_CREATION_FOR_USER: You can't create a reservation for another user
CREATE_OPERATION.REFUGE_OR_USER_NOT_FOUND: Refuge or user has been deleted, refresh the page

DETAILS.MESSAGE: The day {{day}} of month {{month}} of year: {{year}}

ABOUT.BODY: We are Ferran, Oriol, Pablo, and Alex, postgraduate students in Computer Science at the University of Lleida (UdL). United by our love for technology and outdoor activities, we have created RefuAPP - a groundbreaking application intended to improve the outdoor adventure experience in the Pyrenees.
ABOUT.BODY2: RefuApp is more than merely a map; it's your digital guide for traversing the Pyrenees. The app offers a comprehensive view of the region, including the locations of shelters. With a simple touch, you can learn about each shelter's facilities, capacities, and more. Our distinctive reservation system lets users virtually "book" a spot for the night, adding to the collective understanding of the shelter's capacity. At certain locations, we've integrated advanced technology such as infrared sensors and thermal cameras to track the shelter's capacity in real time, giving you the most precise and current information.
ABOUT.LEARNMORE: Did you know that RefuApp is open source? Click to learn more!
